name: Getting Started
description: Learn how to sign in and navigate OrbitOS

steps.title: Welcome to OrbitOS
steps.content: OrbitOS is your AI-native operating system for business. Let's take a quick tour of the main features.

steps.title: Navigation Sidebar
steps.content: Use the sidebar on the left to navigate between different sections of OrbitOS.

steps.title: Search & Help
steps.content: Press Cmd+K (or Ctrl+K) anytime to search help, features, and concepts.

steps.title: Organization Switcher
steps.content: If you belong to multiple organizations, you can switch between them here.

steps.title: You're Ready!
steps.content: You now know the basics. Explore the different sections to learn more about OrbitOS capabilities.
